title: You’ll Live in Squalor, They’re Destroying Our Dollar | Guests: Mark Brnovich & Dr. Robert Malone | 3/10/22
description:
The White House claimed that inflation is going down, but Glenn gives us the latest numbers proving that’s untrue. Glenn discusses the government's insane money printing and plans to regulate cryptocurrency and create a digital dollar. Pat Gray joins to discuss China’s newest film about the Uyghur concentration camps and Glenn’s podcast with Dr. Robert Malone. Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich joins to discuss his Wall Street Journal article “ESG May Be an Antitrust Violation.” Glenn discusses the importance of standing up for the truth and your beliefs, even when it’s hard. Dr. Robert Malone joins to discuss Russia breaking into Ukraine's labs and the possible use of biochemical weapons.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
